description: Essential core warmth that combines the benefits of the First Light insulation with key panels of merino-blend fabric, the First Light Hybrid Vest provides crucial and incredibly breathable midlayer performance.
name: Black Diamond First Light Hybrid Vest - Mens

specs.value: Schoeller® stretch-woven nylon with Eco-Repel Bio® PFC-Free DWR Technology (80 gsm, 93% nylon, 7% Elastane)
PrimaLoft® Silver Insulation Active (60 gsm, 100% polyester)
Blended merino wool (300 gsm, 100% nylon face, 100% merino wool backer)
